captions.text: Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on
1 million!
woohoo

Well done honey
woohoo,

Thank you so much 1 million subscribers that
is huge.

I really can't fathom just how many people
1 million people is, that is just so many.

I started my channel a little while ago and
in Jan 2012 I had 100 subscribers I was so

excited.
And I just wanted to say thank you to those

of you who have been around since the beggining
and given me feedback on sound and microphones
and video tips and all of those things.

Then there was 10,000 subscribers in the how
to cook that tribe.

Then the very next month thanks to you all
liking and sharing the instagram dessert suddenly

there was 100,000 subscribers which just blew
me away.

By March the next year with lots more videos
and heaps more content there was 500,000,

half a million people and I think I've totally
underestimated just big one million sprinkles

is going to be I don't think it is going to
fit.

Now 8 months later there is one million...
and it is not going to fit on the screen that

is only 600,000 but you get the picture. And
in all of that with all of those subscribers

each and every one of you as an individual
is still important to us. Which is why I still

try to answer as many questions I can. It's
getting harder and harder to get to them all,
but we still do as many as we can.
Woohoo.
Thank you all for subscribing
Can you help me?
[laughter]

OK now we have to go.
[music]

title: ONE MILLION SUBSCRIBERS!!!!!!!!!! How To Cook That
